question: What was the theme of the 11th edition of ‘DefExpo 2020’?
option1: India: The Emerging Defence Manufacturing Hub
option2: India: The leading Defence Manufacturing Hub
option3: India: With the people, For the People, By the people
answer: India: The Emerging Defence Manufacturing Hub
explanation: The 11th edition of ‘DefExpo 2020’ was the first time defence exhibition which was held in the northern state (Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh). The theme of the 11th edition of ‘DefExpo 2020’ was "India: The Emerging Defence Manufacturing Hub".
